item.title: Overflowing council housing bins rubbish on the street, 30th July
item.description:
Every waste collection day looks like this on Blean Grove outside the council run housing. Itâ€™s disgusting and a health hazard. This needs a permanent solution to the waste management of the block not a 1 time fix.

item.title: Constant Dog Fouling on residential road, 30th July
item.description:
There is repeated dog fouling happening on Lincoln Road. Large amounts are being left in the pavement outside various houses, it seems to be either at night or early hours of the morning. Has been outside number 8, 6, 4 and other houses over the past few months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Lincoln Road, Sidcup, London
